title: "What is Hermetism and how does it relate to achieving the super-human state?"
first_phrase: This text discusses the concept of Hermeticism, which involves working on various substances such as the body, human, tree, feelings, ideas and even "God" to achieve consciousness. It is an admirable objective, but it must be undertaken only after mastering other concerns, as the realization of the super-human being is the main goal of this path. The last 200 tokens explore the ideas of true alchemy, science, and the materiality of the universe based on various authors' perspectives, including Carlos Castaneda, Savoretti and Eckhartshausen.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the true alchemy is the knowledge of traditional principles and laws of power that govern life in humans and nature. It involves the reconstruction of the fallen human process to its purity and perfection through moral regeneration, physical purification, and transmutation. The understanding of the materiality of the universe and the synthesis of its essential elements: matter, life, and energy are vital. The achievement of the super-human state is the ultimate goal of alchemy, but it requires mastery of all other concerns.
